events.message: I received the wrong item and I want to request a refund because it’s not what I ordered.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer requesting money back for a wrong item.
An agent has been assigned to the case to assist the customer with their refund request.
Hello! I’m sorry to hear you received the wrong item. I’m here to help you with your refund.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received so we can process the refund?
Sure, my order number is 54321. I have attached a photo showing the incorrect product that arrived today.
Thank you for the details. We will issue a full refund to your payment method within 5 business days. You may keep or return the wrong item at no cost.
Thanks for the quick response and clear instructions. I appreciate the hassle-free refund process.
Your refund request has been processed successfully. Please allow a few days for the transaction to reflect.
Just checking in to confirm you received your refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with.
We are closing this case as your refund has been completed and no further action is required.
Please take a moment to complete our satisfaction survey to help us improve our service.
